website_summaries.verdict: This speaker has great sound and some nice extras.
pros: The built-in lithium ion batteries have 25 hours of life when fully charged
Speaker connects to devices via Bluetooth or 3.5 millimeter cable
You can answer, decline, and end calls with the phone button on the speaker, and it has a USB port to charge your device as well
cons: Some have had issues with Bluetooth connectivity

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working after a few months. Vendor does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Stoped working after a few months. Vendor does not offer warranty even for item less than one year old.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: sometimes I get some annoying static.
customer_reviews.text: After just over 3 months of use..And only once or twice a week use...Its dead..its connected to an iPad and iPhone..No sound!! sometimes I get some annoying static..I really wish the seller would own up to this and refund my money..Ill gladly send it back and pay the shipping..I d just like to get a new speaker..but I can't..im out 200.00 dollars!!! I would not buy this if your thinking about it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Poorer quality than I ever would have expected from this brand. It sounded like the speakers had already been blown out the first time I turned it on. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Colton J. Smith, D.O.

customer_reviews.title: INSTANT CLASSIC!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely blown away by the big sound that comes out of this portable speaker. Behind the Marshall name is quality because this speaker is built very good and strong. I will enjoy this tiny speaker that sounds like a full surround system for many years to come. I will probably buy one of these for every room in my home. Thanks Marshall and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: RANDQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Worst buy ever. Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a great buy. Totally disapointed. Has a really poor quality sound. Cannot even increase the volume to the max because it automatically turns the sound off. My samsung s9+ has a better speaker. Dont waste your money, amazon doesnt even help you with the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good sound, difficult wireless connection
customer_reviews.text: I do think it sounds good but the bluetooth connection is wonky. I have to try several times to get iPhone connected to it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyunauthorized

customer_reviews.title: Sooo many compliments. I've already got a Bose Mini ...
customer_reviews.text: Sooo many compliments. I've already got a Bose Mini & it's not even comparable. So I ordered the Marshal..... 25 hrs on a charge & you can charge your phone off if it.
customer_reviews.author: FIGJAM

customer_reviews.title: Just loving it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beyond my expectation. The sound is full, determination of instruments clear, bass and treble range more than sufficient. I was and still am very surprised what kind of sound can such a device deliver. I am using it either when travelling - it's always great to listen to some favorite music in the hotel room, at home when I want to listen to music at different places or eventually in my office. In my opinion it's loud enough (as I never went past 6 out of 10), clear enough (rock, jazz, symphony...) and the battery allows more than 25 hours before I need to charge it again. I love this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL FIALA

customer_reviews.title: Can’t override automatic power down
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is fine on aux cable but gets choppy on Bluetooth and needs to disconnect and reconnect to restore sound quality. The most annoying “feature” is the automatic power off after 20 minutes of inactivity, even when plugged into AC power and the aux jack. I understand for Bluetooth link and battery power, but essentially defeats my intended use of an aux speaker for my Echo Dot. Buyers be aware of this prior to purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K.

customer_reviews.title: Bummer👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Was super stoked on this radio. Recieved my radio, synced to my phone via Bluetooth with no problem. Sounded awesome, buuuuut the Damn thing only powers on when plugged inn. Left alone plugged in to fully charge and 5 hrs later still same result. Battery isn't hold charge, at all. Completely disapointed. Luckily Amazon is good about taking care of their customers and I am getting a full refund. Kinda on the fence on giving this one a second chance and buying a replacement. Bummer because it looks and sound really good.
customer_reviews.author: jon gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: I love you but...
customer_reviews.text: This is almost a perfect buy. Almost. I have noticed some defects when it comes to the Bluetooth connectivity after just a few months use. The range is not very big and it is starting to cut out more and more. I am fully anticipating the Bluetooth to go completely. It still looks lovely and is a great size for the sound. I love the controls at the top. I can tweak the sound depending on the music and they snap down to give a nice streamline look. Truly a unique feature. Would I buy again? Maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Linsey

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it sounds
customer_reviews.text: Does it look good? absolutely. I personally own the Marshall Killburn, Stockwell, as well as the Bose sound link. The best looking is definitely the Stockwell. The best in sound quality: The killburn....followed by the Bose.Last is the stockwell. The stockwell sounds like a cheap $25 soind system. Weak bass, weak treble, simply a weak junk As portable sound system, I would give the Killburn a 9/10, Bose 6/10, Stockwell 4/10 Go for the Killburn. Avoid Stockwell
customer_reviews.author: W. Noshie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Device
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence, This Marshall Speaker freaking is amazing. It's LOUD and high quality sound. It has built in Bass, Treble, and Volume knobs that pop-up. it's really stable sitting in the upright position especially with the hard-case. I got is as a gift for someone and they are blown away with the build quality and the sound quality. This thing is HEAVY. Ive only charged it twice. Or you can just leave it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Delrosario

customer_reviews.title: Marshall does it again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband at Christmas to replace his iLoud. He loves it! The case allows him to nestle it between his dashboard and front windshield so that he uses it everyday for podcasts and music. He also uses it with his iPad for games. He hasn’t used it yet for his guitar (he’s a musician and has a Marshall stack for gigs), but he will for app usage. He says that the sound is better than the iLoud. I’m very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Bought by mistake, and now use it daily
customer_reviews.text: OK, so I bought this by mistake. I liked the look of it but wasn't sure how it would sound. But, I put in my cart for whatever reason and forgot about it. A day later I didn't pay attention and bought it along with whatever else I was getting for Christmas. Long story short, I couldn't bring myself to return it, because it sounded so good, and the battery lasts forever. Came with a great cover lined with red velvet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Zielinski

customer_reviews.title: Very good bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: The Marshall Stockwell is a fantastic blue tooth speaker. Of course, the best part of it is the iconic Marshall look, but the sound quality is not far behind. My only problem so far with it is the volume doesn't get as loud as I would want, but that is fairly common for me. The other drawback, is while the design is slick and iconic to look at, carrying this around is not practical, except if you put it in a backpack or bag of somekind. Moving it around the house, can get dicey, because there is really no good place to hold it. But that is minor problem as far as I am concerned.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: great portable speaker with very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: good portable speaker, good sound, long battery life and can also charge your phone while playing music which is awesome, very well made, i needed a speaker for back yard bbqs and didn’t want to break the bank, the sound quality is good not great you can adjust bass and treble, it’s charges your phone which i like, sounds good in the back yard or when i’m cleaning the garage...
customer_reviews.author: MikeC

customer_reviews.title: Solid built Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality little speaker. Bluetooth works flawlessly and it is solidly built. The sound is decent. I prefer my Bose Soundlink, but that’s all going to be personal preference. I think this speaker sounds more flat than my Bose which has highs that are more clear and the low end is a little louder. Overall though this is a very nice speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jared James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely bigger than most portable spearker, but the material is so sturdy and nice to the touch, that it's worth it. The style and feel of this speaker is classy and strong. If you're looking for that 'coolness' factor, you also, can't go wrong! Am thrilled with this purchase. Also, doesn't look like those others that are so basic. This one shows you care about details! Recommend for the music lover who has style.
customer_reviews.author: bopirate

customer_reviews.title: Retro Speaker, Modern Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Marshall brand of home speakers. This is my second Marshall product. Always links to my phone without any hesitation. I love that it also has a microphone so you can actually use it to talk to people, not just listen to music. It also has a USB charger! So you ca. Charge your phone with it. I use it as my nightstand speaker and I Night I plug in my phone, listen to music and charges while I sleep. Great set up, great look!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Mind Blowing Sound A+A+AAA++
customer_reviews.text: Wow I ordered this because a friend said he loved his Marshall speaker so I decided to give it a shot as I was looking for something for my kitchen upon opening the box I was a little shocked as how small it was and almost was going to send it back...I called my friend and he said not to plug it in and trust me...so I did and was absolutely amazed at sound quality that came out of this little system only about an inch thick it’s perfect for the kitchen and easily can fill my apt with music with no problem if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: EPWagner

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound and great battery life but a tad too heavy to bring along. On the bright side, it's a very beautiful speaker. You'd want to display it in your home :D
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Lost volume after few months
customer_reviews.text: Sounds pretty good but I think I lost volume/power after some months. Don't know why. Suddenly I turn up the volume and the max is not the same as the first times.
customer_reviews.author: FernD

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this if you want it to last for a year
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive bluetooth speaker I ever purchased and it lasted just over a year and then the on/off button broke. The company refused to take any responsibility. I will certainly not purchase their products again unless they do something about this. It's clearly an issue as I'm now seeing a ton of reviews like this for this product. If you want a reliable speaker from a reliable company, DON'T buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound for price
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, some distortion at higher volume especially with higher bass settings. Good enough for small outdoor gatherings or poolside. Won’t work well if you’re attending riots, but fine for home.
customer_reviews.author: Ascnbe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for almost a year now and everyone loves it. The sound quality is great. The speaker packs a humongous sound for such a little speaker. My only complaint, (which deducted a star) is the flip cover. It is supposed to be magnetic and also clip onto the speaker but it does not stay well connected to the back of the speaker. Otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: chkaryti

customer_reviews.title: You didn't buy it because of the sound quality, but the sound quality is great!
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest, you buy this guy because it looks super cool, and it's from Marshall, so the sound quality shouldn't be bad right? Right!!!!!! It sounds great, battery life is awesome. I'm a happy camper. And I look super cool with my marshall speaker... ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Nate Murr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: best of 6 speakers I'd auditioned. A finely crafted piece of art and conversation starter to boot. Just wish that it wouldn't shut down after 15 mins of disuse when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: guyc

customer_reviews.title: So nice to see every day, not so much to hear!
customer_reviews.text: The coolest looking speaker ever! Seriously!! No other speaker will give you tbe same wow factor. Every time you will take a look at it will make you proud. For $100 bucks, it is the best investment you can make to just admire or be a good conversation starter with your family. However, sound is not great. In fact its just OK! Don't have high quality sound expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work without a cord!
customer_reviews.text: So, we love this speaker, it looks cool, sounds great and is easy to use. And that was great for a year or so, when it started being wonky. What we realized is that it absolutely positively won't work without being plugged in! Which is, I mean, OKish, we still use it, but it's supposed to be a PORTABLE speaker, and it's just not anymore. Alas.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rackliffe Lucey

customer_reviews.title: Small box... big sound.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it in today and it has replaced my other electronics in one song. It has a great sounds and that you can tweak the bass and treble is a great thing. It gives you that sound quality you want for your type of jams. It can get up there in sound as well. Little to no distortion at high volume. I live in a small place and this fills it up perfectly. 4.99 stars.... if it only went to 11.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Speaker on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is superb. The ability to adjust bass/treble is excellent. Connection via Blue Tooth is stable and easy to connect. Marshall Delivers again with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C

customer_reviews.title: Good price point for a good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of a Marshall bluetooth device. I've been thrilled with my first purchase, and extremely satisfied with this product as an option for a small room. It provides great sound quality at a great price. No regrets on this purchase, and I would definitely purchase Marshall bluetooth speakers again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Buyers aware, I have seen many having the same issue with me in the comment section. It started out as static noises here and there. Today it stopped working completely, all I can hear is static noises no matter what type of input was I on. This is the first piece of electronics in my possession that had broken down during these few years.
customer_reviews.author: Wang Jianyu

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! I get compliments on how it looks all the time. Portability is great - brought it to the rooftop for a birthday party, and I take it to the bathroom daily so I have music when I shower. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Monique A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love the design but that’s about it...
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this unit. It looks very classy and it feels durable. The downside of this is unfortunately the most important... the sound. It just sounds hollow with lots of bass. In definitely returning this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolai Lim

customer_reviews.title: Really love this item
customer_reviews.text: Really love this item! The sound/ bass is great! The style is Sleek, simple, the gold and black adds a classic style! My favorite part is the gold push buttons, it makes it feel retro!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Good Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Sound Quality and portability are the main things for these speakers!!! No doubts to buy this if you want something that is for an outing and travelling, picnics or just enjoying an evening by the campsite listening to your favourite music!
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Really rich and warm sound.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my office. Sounds great and the bass is rich. Kinda wished the battery would last longer than 20 hours but that’s about all I get out of it. The cover is lush. I like how magnetic it is, it’s strong enough to cling to flat steel surfaces with a bit of authority.
customer_reviews.author: I.C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, looks cool as hell.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speaker. It’s not as loud as the UE megaboom, but the sound quality is slightly better. Build quality is excellent and with the flip cover it’s definitely one of the best looking small speakers out there.
customer_reviews.author: SJX

customer_reviews.title: Little connection failures
customer_reviews.text: After using of 2 weeks speaker started to make bluetooth connection failures. it works fine but sometimes makes failures. and when you pay this much you get very nervous when "marshall" speaker does something like this. i dont know what will happen in future, but this little failures make me very sad. im disappointed. i couldve bought something else with better sound in this price but i wanted quality and long life performance. after 2 weeks come on man only 2 weeks and i experience something like this.!!
customer_reviews.author: ninika

customer_reviews.title: No more terrible sound streaming spotify off of my computer speakers
customer_reviews.text: This is such a stylish little speaker. No more terrible sound streaming spotify off of my computer speakers. This would make a great little gift too.
customer_reviews.author: LGCycle

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more happy with this speaker. I’ve owned everything from cheap to Bose. This speaker just makes me happy. It’s sounds just like I want it to. I was nervous that the price wouldnt justify the speaker; it was well worth it. Very very happy with this speaker. It’s now my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect a super loud boom box type of sound. This is just good sounding portable speaker. Don't expect audiophile quality, but do expect a better sound than the tubular style potables. This speaker is very attractive and looks and feels high quality.
customer_reviews.author: 1911carrier

customer_reviews.title: Speaking of great speakers...
customer_reviews.text: This syncs to our Android phones with no problems. We've never really tried to move it place to place. Definitely looking into buying another Marshall speaker.
customer_reviews.author: DeCampfire

customer_reviews.title: Fine fit and finish, sounds left wanting
customer_reviews.text: love the look and design. material is good quality. Sound has limitation in the low and mid ranges, while highs are crisp. the bass and treble corrects most of the limitations. Rock, easy listening and classic rock plays well here. Other music is challenged here.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime M. Locquiao

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sound quality not as impressive
customer_reviews.text: After exactly one year after the purchase, the speaker stopped working. Until then, I was fairly pleased with it. The sound quality was not as clear as I would have liked. The best thing about it is the aesthetic. It would be nice if it had a handle to carry it. I hope whatever made it go mute can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Francesca

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it looks...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase so far... This speaker is so good looking, sound is very good (not the best but I use it at home) and the battery lasts a lot! I love it's vintage style. Also has a timer, so it is a plus. Definitely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia M.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great, Looks Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and looks awesome. Has more bass than I though it would. Very portable and battery charge lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jjhcw

customer_reviews.title: Sounds and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, and he loves it!! He is really into electronics, so I was a little skeptical about the quality, but it sounds great! He has it on his desk at work.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it. Small so you can take it everywhere, sounds great, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Pérez G.

customer_reviews.title: Sound Clarity is great and it looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Well tell you I read the reviews on the speaker and I bought mine I think it sounds great and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Keith miller

customer_reviews.title: model is iffy
customer_reviews.text: Had no pwr suspected charger , rec'v replacement had no sound from Bluetooth mode Took new charger and hook it up to 1st one delivered , WORKS OKAY NOW RETURNED REPLACEMENT SPEAKER WITH 1ST CHARGER INFORMED WITH NOTE IN BOX , CHARGER NG & NO SOUND IN SPEAKER BLUETOOTH MODE YOU'RE WELCOME FOR NOT SENDING ME A 3RD REPLACEMENT 👌😉
customer_reviews.author: vincent j fighera

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, so I cannot comment other that to say that the gift recipient absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: GiosDai

customer_reviews.title: Annoying On/Off button
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is fine, it's aesthetically pleasing, and I really like the hideaway knobs. That said, you have to hold the on/off button for 3 seconds to turn it on or off. Why in the world would they do that? They almost got the interface just right then ruined it with the on/off button.
customer_reviews.author: Bosco Baracus

customer_reviews.title: Buy one! I own 3
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are very welcome in my household, especially Marshall, awesome build compact and a fantastic case
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Maynard

customer_reviews.title: very nice to own
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stop listening to this blue tooth speaker. It simply sounds incredible. I was very surprised with the sound quality especially since its a small speaker. it was worth the purchase. I will have to purchase another for a gift. you will not be disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: james hunter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speaker
customer_reviews.text: What can i say to this amazing product, it’s just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Riffka

customer_reviews.title: Great product- dead after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It was so great! Until it broke 4 months after buying it- with only light use. Now it’s a brick.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Benediktsson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect!! Good sound quality, can control the bass, treble, volume, and can plug in an AUX cord or even your guitar (get a 3.5mm to a guitar plug cord ~$10 on Amazon). It’s slim and lightweight, so it’s portable. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cmd0894

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound for such a small and rechargeable speaker! Just got it out of the box and am very impressed. I've also got a bose speaker that's very comparable in quality but $100 more and this one is just as good if not better. Plus it looks sexy.
customer_reviews.author: George Washington III

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is unbelievable. This speaker sound great, and looks even better. Love the vintage style red velvet!
customer_reviews.author: Alena H.

customer_reviews.title: Not expecting
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't compare with the other Marshall speakers. The bigger ones are better because it has more bass.
customer_reviews.author: Myk A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a music fan, this is a perfect gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Lovely speaker, good for travel use
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and cute speaker, the amplifier is really good with this easy handling size
customer_reviews.author: LCY

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound.
customer_reviews.text: "It's small, loud and sounds great. Also aesthetically pleasing". Says my hipster sister.
customer_reviews.author: Tod R Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love it....the sound quality is superb.... Excellent battery life.... And its size is perfect to carry anywhere you want
customer_reviews.author: Edward Labeau

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Dad is happy :)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Dad for his birthday (he is very hard to please) and he loved it! I inboxed and set it up and was very easy to read instructions and teach him about it:) also loved that the charger was thicker and stated Marshall on it so he won’t get it mixed up with other chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Costelnock

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a gift
customer_reviews.text: As far as I know this works great! I bought it as a gift for a friend, and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound is awesome! You can hear clearly medium and bass sounds. The box is beautiful and solid, with tune botton control, Trebble and bass.
customer_reviews.author: Junnius

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, nice base but not that loud
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, definitelly premium, but if you go to max, you can hear clearly the distortion, maybe the killburn doesn't have this issue. It's portable, so it's good and nice for a small party at home, with around 15 people or something.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Mello

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend who wanted to buy this. So I just test it less than 30 minutes. Pros: looking good. affordable (sale) Cons: a little heavy. low quality sound (due to small speaker size)
customer_reviews.author: PARK

customer_reviews.title: Small box, big sound!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and sound, I get so many compliments on the look of this speaker and its resemblance to an amp. Chicks dig it!
customer_reviews.author: Hajicoyote

customer_reviews.title: Marshall Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely in love with this speaker. It's beautiful and sounds amazing. It is portable but it's a little too big in my opinion to be a portable speaker but if you really wanted to you could.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: excellent design good battery life
customer_reviews.text: i dont like the marshall logo that you can see that is plastic cause it is not totally painted on the sides, only painted on top. Despite that, sound quality is good and battery life is good. Gives you music and is also a decoration item
customer_reviews.author: Lorena De Dieu

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the wife to either plug in direct from her laptop or Bluetooth too. She loves the look, sound and size. Great for closed rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Never buy! It looks cute and that is it. Shuts off randomly. Will not connect to Bluetooth has major connections problems. If you can get it to connect it will cut out and disconnect randomly. Aux doesn’t work. Do not waste your money and time. Junk. Zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: The best Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, the best portable Bluetooth speaker I ever own. I like it even better then the Boss Speakers.
customer_reviews.author: N. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Greatest buy
customer_reviews.text: Really great speaker, more than inspected. Powerful dynamic music sounds fill any hall or room. Oh yeah Bluetooth ok to.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman MacCutcheon

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after two weeks of use. Dont buy from seller Premier660, they never responded for a return. Amazon did not help either.
customer_reviews.author: Vin M

customer_reviews.title: good for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Really good product provide you better life. Working perfect with Alexa. And the music list including almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker. Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: The sound control is a little difficult to use when hooked up to iPad. Wish it was just a little louder.
customer_reviews.author: ErinHazelwood

customer_reviews.title: Why get a lame looking speaker when you can..
customer_reviews.text: This wireless / Bluetooth speaker pumps out full bodied sound. It’s super light weight, durable, and fits anywhere. Plus it looks like classic Marshall guitar amplifier. - BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Nawaz

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker...
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound and great battery life! The flip case is quality as well. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-Customer 1.145

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, perfect size, sound is crisp and clear. Happy with my purchase. Really good Marshall product.
customer_reviews.author: nuvia

customer_reviews.title: I am delighted!
customer_reviews.text: It looks cool, a nice case that is very pleasant to the touch. Very range sound, good battery, like buttons that can be hidden! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Julia AmericanSaller

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, doesn't take up a lot of space, definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Woods

product_meta.title: Marshall Stockwell Portable Bluetooth Speaker, Black (4091390)
product_meta.description: Style:Stockwell SpeakerBuilt for life on the road, the Stockwell is the smallest travel speaker made by Marshall today. This portable active stereo speaker will go wherever you want it to. Rechargeable lithium-ion batteries are built into the Stockwell, which give it 25 hours of playing time. The handy USB port also allows you to charge your devices when you’re on the go. The Stockwell packs a sonic punch, with two 2.25” woofers and two Class D amplifiers, making it the loudest speaker in its class. Volume, bass and treble can be adjusted quickly and easily with the retractable analog control knobs located at the top of the speaker. Using the Stockwell to receive and end phone calls is a breeze, just tap the phone button on the control panel to answer, or tap it again to end a call. Bluetooth 4.0 technology and a 3.5mm input means connecting your listening device is super easy.
feature_bullets: Portable speaker for life on the road
Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion batteries allow for 25 hours of play time
Enjoy your music without the hassle of wires, since Stockwell comes with Bluetooth 4.0 wireless technology
Answer, decline and end calls with the phone button
Features a handy USB port to charge your listening device while you're on the go
